title: Add Epic CLI commands
description: Implement CLI commands for Epic management: epic add, epic list, epic show, epic update, epic done. Include commands for adding/removing tasks and sub-epics to epics. Handle status validation logic.

comments.text: CLI COMMANDS: './tm epic add --title "Epic title" --description "Description"', './tm epic list', './tm epic show --id epic-1', './tm epic add-task --id epic-1 --task-id task-1', './tm epic add-epic --id epic-1 --child-id epic-2', './tm epic done --id epic-1' (with validation)
